categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: "Boba Fett - The Bounty Hunter" is the thirty-third episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com website and YouTube on June 21, 2019.

On the bridge of the Executor, the Imperial Admiral Firmus Piett reacts negatively to the presence of several bounty hunters including Dengar, Bossk, Boba Fett, 4-LOM, and Zuckuss. Darth Vader tasks the five bounty hunters with hunting down the crew of the Millennium Falcon.

The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures", Boba Fett always gets his bounty. There is a a scene of Fett firing his blaster and capturing a green Twi'lek fugitive before jetting off in his jetpack. The video then flashes forward to Fett wrapping his whipcord thrower around Luke Skywalker at the Great Pit of Carkoon. In another scene, Fett flies the Slave I through hyperspace and then engages in a space battle.

The video then flashes forward to Fett flying the Slave I to Jabba's Palace with Han Solo frozen in carbonite. Jabba and his entourage including Salacious B. Crumb and Bib Fortuna laugh mockingly at Solo. Fett then jets off into a battle where he hurls several grenades, resulting in explosions.

Returning to the Executor, Vader reminds Fett that he wants them alive, emphasizing "no disintegrations." Fett complies with Vader's orders. The video then flashes forward to Fett's last stand at the Great Pit of Carkoon.
